author: BBC News
description: After 146 years, the Ringling Bros and Barnum & Bailey Circus holds its final show in New York.
title: Ringling Brothers circus stages final show

author: Gina Cherelus
description: The clowns, animal acts and acrobats of the storied Ringling Bros and Barnum & Bailey Circus are taking their final bow at an arena outside New York City on Sunday in the farewell performance of the "Greatest Show on Earth" after nearly 150 years.
title: 'Greatest Show on Earth' takes its final bow after 146 years

author: TAMARA LUSH
description: UNIONDALE, N.Y. (AP) — With laughter, hugs and tears — and the requisite death-defying stunts — the Ringling Bros. and Barnum & Bailey Circus received its final standing ovation Sunday night as it performed its last show. "We are, forevermore, the Greatest Show on Earth," boomed Johnathan Lee Iverson, who has been the ringmaster since 1999. His son, who also performed, stood by his side. The show was held at the Nassau County Coliseum in Uniondale, New York, about 30 miles (48 kilometers) east of New York City.
title: Ringling Bros. shuts down the big top after 146 years
